resources.string: VIVACHICLAYO only shows in the directory location data of taxi companies, guides and tourism companies in the SCHEDULE section. The deals are made directly with stakeholders freeing us from any responsibility for it.

VIVACHICLAYO was initially started at the Private University of Juan MejÃ­a Baca (UMB) by interns from Brigham Young University, who wanted to give tourists of Chiclayo, Peru easier access to information about the area. The information provided on this website is based on first-hand experience of the Chiclayo area. Since information can change pretty quickly, students and professors from the Hotel Management, Tourism, Ecotourism, and Gastronomy Major at UMB will be updating and adding information when necessary.
